input.sentences: our annual costume party was a great hit and we took a lot of pictures starting with this one .
there were so many creative outfits out there | and i think i found the best group costume . chess board and pieces !
or if you 're a vegas fan | this one is also a winner .
some people did n't want to put much effort | so they chose a simple animal dress up .
and others went all out with props and innocent stuffed animals . we had such a great time !
output.sentences: the chess club was ready to march
but the vegas girls was everyones focus
they loaded their tanks with puppies and waged war on the parade
